email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

I hope this message finds you well. We are looking to ship 15,000MT of coal from Newcastle to Shanghai under CIF terms. Could you provide a suitable vessel candidate and a freight quote?

Best regards,
Lucas Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer the vessel OCEAN HARMONY, with a DWT of 82,500 and LOA of 225m. The laycan is set for 25th to 30th September. The initial freight quote is USD 28.50 per MT.

Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Emily Zhang

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Emily,

Thank you for the offer. USD 28.50 per MT seems a bit high given the current market rates. Could you consider lowering the freight to USD 27.00 per MT?

Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best regards,
Lucas Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Lucas,

Thank you for your response. Considering our long-term relationship, I can offer a revised freight rate of USD 27.50 per MT. The demurrage rate is set at USD 15,000 per day.

Please note that the laycan remains 25th to 30th September. I trust this revised offer meets your expectations.

Best regards,
Emily Zhang

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Emily,

Thank you for the revised offer. We can agree to the USD 27.50 per MT, provided the laycan is strictly adhered to. Could you confirm the stem details and any potential delays?

Best regards,
Lucas Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Lucas,

I confirm that the laycan will be strictly adhered to, and the stem details are as follows: loading at Newcastle on 25th September, with a 24-hour loading window. There are no anticipated delays at this stage.

Please let me know if you need any further clarifications.

Best regards,
Emily Zhang

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Emily,

Thank you for the confirmation. We agree to the terms and will proceed with the booking. Please send over the contract for review.

Best regards,
Lucas Carter
